summary: Workflows encounter a NotDeadLetterException (NDE) during replay in SDK 1.11.0 and 1.11.1 despite no code changes. The issue typically involves TimerCanceled commands or command ordering changes.
userImpact: Existing workflows that previously ran successfully now fail during replay without any code changes, blocking workflow execution and causing production issues.
keyQuote: some Workflows may result in NDE on replay, even though there's been no change to Workflow Code
